TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeDirectiveCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection> class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirective> objects.
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the members of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection> class.
